name: Thekua
description: Thekua is a traditional Indian sweet snack made with whole wheat flour, jaggery, and ghee. It is a popular snack in Bihar, Jharkhand, and Uttar Pradesh.

name: Sattu Paratha
description: Sattu Paratha is a traditional Indian flatbread made with whole wheat flour and stuffed with a spicy and tangy mixture of roasted gram flour, spices, herbs, and onions.

name: Khaja
description: Khaja is a traditional Indian sweet snack made with all-purpose flour, sugar, and ghee. It is a popular snack in Bihar, Odisha, and Uttar Pradesh.

name: Laiya Chana

name: Malpua
description: Malpua is a traditional Indian sweet pancake made with all-purpose flour, sugar, and milk. It is a popular dessert in Bihar, Odisha, and Uttar Pradesh.
